admin.sent: $t(emojis:Admin) | Admin commands sent to your DM!

staff.sent: $t(emojis:Mod) | Staff commands sent to your DM!

util.sent: $t(emojis:util) | Utility commands sent to your DM!

autorole.name: autorole

embed.title: Help | Autorole
description: Set autoroles for new members. Max roles: **5**

errors.rolesAlreadyAdded: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, These roles have already been added!!
errors.reachedLimit: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, You reached the limit of 5 added roles!!
errors.setLimit: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, You can only add 5 roles at a time, silly!
errors.removeLimit: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, You can only remove 5 roles at a time, silly!

autorole.add: $t(emojis:autorole) **|** Adding role {{- roles}} to autorole list.
autorole.add_plural: $t(emojis:autorole) **|** Adding roles {{- roles}} to autorole list.
autorole.remove: $t(emojis:autorole) **|** Removing role {{- roles}} from autorole list.
autorole.remove_plural: $t(emojis:autorole) **|** Removing roles {{- roles}} from autorole list.

embed.title: Help | Message
embed.description: Use the commands below to set up the welcome message!

errors.noArgs: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, Replace `<message>` with the new dm message: `{{- prefix}}message dm <message>`.
errors.lengthLimit: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, Your message is too long!! The limit is {{max}} chars.

dm.setMessage: $t(emojis:MensagemK) **|** {{- user}}, New DM welcome message: `{{- message}}`

errors.lengthLimit: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, Your message is too long!! The limit is {{max}} chars!!

welcome.setChannel: $t(emojis:MensagemK) **|** {{- user}}, Welcome messages will be sent on {{- channel}}.

errors.lengthLimit: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, Your message is too long!! The limit is {{max}} chars!!

goodbye.setChannel: $t(emojis:MensagemK) **|** {{- user}}, Goodbye messages will be sent on {{- channel}}.

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description: Change the bot's prefix on your server.

errors.lengthLimit: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, Your prefix is too long!! The limit is {{MAX}} chars.

prefix.changed: $t(emojis:KaelMutado) **|** {{- user}}, My new prefix is: **{{- prefix}}**

recruiter.name: recruiter
recruiter.description: Get how many members someone recruited.

errors.noInvites: **{{- tag}}** This server has no invites.

embed.title: Recruiters | {{- guildName}}
embed.description: This is the ranking of the best recruiters on this server!

roleall.name: roleall
roleall.description: Add up to 5 roles to each member.

errors.rolesLimit: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, You can only add up to 5 roles at a time.

roleall.done: $t(emojis:Kaeltec) **|** {{- user}}, All members received the specified roles!

say.name: say
say.description: Say something and I'll repeat it.

errors.noArgs: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, Specify what you want me to say!

errors.userMissingPerm: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, You don't have enough permission to ban this user.
errors.botMissingPerm: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, I don't have enough permission to ban this user.

embed.title: Kael | Banned
embed.footer: You need to learn good manners üè´

errors.userMissingPerm: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, You don't have enough permission to kick this user.
errors.botMissingPerm: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, I don't have enough permission to kick this user.

banimage.name: banimage
banimage.description: Set a custom ban image or gif.
banimage.imageAdded: $t(emojis:KaelVerificacaoAnimado) **|** {{- user}}, You added a custom ban image.

clear.name: clear

errors.NaN: $t(emojis:Limpeza) **|** {{- user}}, That's not a number! Try something between 2 and 2000.
errors.sizeLimit: $t(emojis:Limpeza) **|** {{- user}}, I can only clear {{min}} to {{max}} messages at a time!

clear.description: Clear a number of channel or user messages.
clear.messageDeleted: $t(emojis:Limpeza) **|** {{- user}}, The message (**ID: {{id}}**) was deleted succesfully!
clear.userBulkDelete: $t(emojis:Kaeltec) **|** {{- user}}, **{{- tag}}** messages were deleted successfully!

embed.title: Kael | Security
learnMore: Hello, do you wanna know how my security system works?
It's quite simple! Specify which of my defenses you want active through a **parameter**

errors.range: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, enter a whole number between 0% and 100%.
